Posts.EditableText: Do you mean Gamebook? Possible problem is that the names of the page its on and the page its going to are misspelled or in the wrong order (I find this is the most common). The page you're on has to be the first one, and the page you're going to has to be the second, otherwise the link won't show up. Also a comma or parenthesis could be misplaced. It has to look like this: AddPageLink (PageYouAreOn, PageYouAreGoingTo, "Look up.") So make sure the names of the pages are spelled correctly and all that. Say the page link you wanna add is named LookUp. And the page you're currently on is named JustStandingThere. It should look like this: AddPageLink (JustStandingThere, LookUp, "Look up.")

Actually... GameBook does have a "map" function...
In the UI, for each page, 
There is an Options...
There is where you enter the links to other pages.
You can add new rooms on the fly, or link to an existing page.
There is no need to create exits (or links) in code.
